name: gsumsn
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, csn(c1), c5)), c3))
